directions: In a 3 quart saucepan, heat white sugar and corn syrup until bubbles form.  Remove from heat, and stir in peanut butter.
Add chocolate flavored crispy rice cereal; stir to coat well. Gently stir in chocolate chips to give marble effect.
Press into 9x13 inch pan and cool until firm. Cut into bars.
ingredients: 6 cups chocolate flavored crispy rice cereal
title: Marble Bars
